name: thundercats
description: How the thundercats would build Flux architecture

scripts.build-global: NODE_ENV='production' browserify index.js -s ThunderCats -i react -i rx -t babelify -t browserify-shim -g envify -o build/global/ThunderCats.js && NODE_ENV='production' browserify index.js -s ThunderCats -i react -i rx -t babelify -t browserify-shim -g envify -p [minifyify --no-map --uglify[--compress --mangle --dead_code]] -o build/global/ThunderCats.min.js
scripts.build-npm: mkdir build/npm/lib && babel ./lib -d build/npm/lib && cp README.md build/npm && cp index.js build/npm && node -p 'p=require("./package");p.main="lib";p.scripts=p.devDependencies=p["browserify-shim"]=undefined;JSON.stringify(p,null,2)' > build/npm/package.json
scripts.build: npm run build-clean && npm run build-global && npm run build-npm
